prod_short_desc: Speed after Killer Croc’s Tail-Gator on Batman’s Batski!
prod_long_desc:
Stage a land-water pursuit of Killer Croc’s Tail-Gator at Gotham City harbor with this action-packed set from THE LEGO® BATMAN MOVIE. Help Batman™ prevent Killer Croc™, Zebra-Man™ and Tarantula™ from escaping in Croc’s huge Tail-Gator truck featuring big wheels with rubber tires, suspension and two crate bombs. Give chase on Batman’s Batski with two stud shooters. Includes three minifigures with assorted weapons and a big figure.
Includes 3 minifigures: Batman™, Zebra-Man™ and Tarantula™, plus a Killer Croc™ big figure.
Killer Croc’s Tail-Gator features a driver’s cabin with space for a minifigure, huge wheels and rubber tires, suspension, two crate bombs and translucent light-style elements.
Batman's Batski has two stud shooters, posable bat wings and a translucent flame element.
Killer Croc™ features a posable head with snapping jaws, posable arms and wrists, and hands with gripping fingers.
Weapons include Batman’s Batarang and Tarantula’s two sai.
Accessory elements include Batman’s cape and new-for-spring-2017 molded utility belt, and Killer Croc’s chains.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 8+.
Tail-Gator measures over 5” high, 7” long and 4” wide.
Batski measures over 1” high, 3” long and 2” wide.
Killer Croc™ stands over 3” tall.
